scripts.clean: rm -rf build && mkdir build && npm run updatedeps
scripts.build:angular: cd angular/src && yarn --force && ng cache clean && npm run build
scripts.build:module: npm run clean && npm run build:angular && npm run copy:package && npm run copy:angular
scripts.release:module:rc: npm run build:module && npm publish ./build --access public --tag rc
scripts.release:module:prod: npm run build:module && npm publish ./build --access public
scripts.build:angular:demo: cd angular/demo && yarn --force && ng cache clean && npm run build
scripts.release:dev: npm run release:module:rc && sleep 10 && npm run release:angular:demo:dev
